7. He Seems Very Happy

We wish them a very happy anniversary and we wish them many more to come.

9. His Husband Stalked Him

All right, stalked is a strong word that absolutely does not apply to this at all, but it is meant in a loose manner of speaking. He first saw his husband in 2003 with a female friend, thought that they were together, and wanted to get to know him more. So, he started showing up places where he knew Burtka would be.
